title: leave buster problem
body: so i cant even play my game anymore because i left the game so i could figure out how to change my move settings to left click and turn off auto attack and i type in "i agree" and  it doesnt work. i try again doesnt work so i try typing it EXACTLY how its spelled in the text and it doesnt work... so can anyone please help me  fix all three of my problems because this is stupid.

replies.body:
Left and right click are reserved bindings and can't be changed.  Trying to change it manually can cause issues like crashing and input problems.  I recommend resetting your UI to fix any possible corruption.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Restart the client and let me know if that helps!
i need help with the leavbuster
